url.description: Specific build URL (e.g. Jenkins build URL).

log.description: URL link to build log. Can be an HTML page.

log_raw.description: URL of a plain-text build log.

log_stream.description: URL of a plain-text build log, which can be followed for progress. Serves different goal than log_raw - while these two may share the same value, it is alsao quite possible taht log_raw would point to some external (cold) storage, making it unsuitable for streaming the output. They also disagree on the time when they are valid - log_raw is supposed to be valid as long as log while log_stream makes sense only when the testing process is running.

rebuild.description: URL link to rebuild the run.
